abstract_summ: COVID-19 infected adult patients were admitted to the ICU at Jaber AlAhmad Al Sabah Hospital, Kuwait, between 1st March, 2020and 30th April 2020 . Pre-existing hypertension, moderate/severe ARDS (OR: 3.4, 95%CI: 1.1-10.8),lymphocyte counts <0.5, albumin < 22, procalcitonin >0.2 and D-Dimer >1200 were significantly associated with mortality . The fatality rate was 43.7% .
